DOC.brief_summary: The study compares the amounts of Vigamox absorbed when administered as eye drops or in a spray form. Both administrations will be prior to patients undergoing elective cataract surgery and the aqueous samples will be analyzed by a laboratory in a masked fashion. The hypothesis is that there will be no difference between the 2 modes of administration.
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence of Eye Drops and Spray Administration of Vigamox
DOC.criteria: Patients scheduled for elective cataract surgery Allergy to Vigamox
